DOC.brief_summary: Static posture , repetitive work task , work stress increase risk musculoskeletal disorder sickness absence . Objective measurement occupational loading - EMG muscular activity , EEG cognitive activity , ECG cardiovascular activity heart rate variability , actigraphy bodily movement - may provide useful early indicator muscular , cognitive cardiovascular overload . The aim study investigate effect individually tailor bio-psycho-social intervention strategy versus `` usual care '' ergonomics standard physical exercise ( reference group ) risk factor lab technician history work-related musculoskeletal pain .
DOC.brief_title: Implementation Physical Exercise Workplace ( IRMA10 ) - Occupational Load
DOC.criteria: Laboratory technician Pain intensity > = 3 ( scale 010 ) Pain duration > = 3 month Pain frequency > = 3 day per week life threaten disease pregnancy
